To demonstrate that messages are delivered in the same order to each application,
we have added commands to print the message ID in the middleware whenever it
delivers a message to the application. Below is the output using the test file
home_away_fast.json which executes commands 100 millisecond apart. The result is
messages are delivered in the same order to each application. The door sensor
process ran on a remote machine accessible through a VPN connection over WIFI.

Database:
[81 179 77 61 117 200 65 60 124 53 74 21 213 240 57 33]
[232 3 215 137 176 12 68 72 126 7 105 105 88 145 126 196]
[220 120 217 102 78 123 68 201 85 155 161 222 107 186 41 78]
[116 4 201 29 87 49 67 127 124 135 200 68 250 165 26 148]
[117 70 250 129 215 213 74 213 115 91 58 53 251 99 195 214]
[171 201 44 93 68 134 65 51 104 170 64 123 223 19 72 245]
[180 105 167 14 33 127 72 223 98 186 187 53 202 140 190 105]

Gateway:
[81 179 77 61 117 200 65 60 124 53 74 21 213 240 57 33]
[232 3 215 137 176 12 68 72 126 7 105 105 88 145 126 196]
[220 120 217 102 78 123 68 201 85 155 161 222 107 186 41 78]
[116 4 201 29 87 49 67 127 124 135 200 68 250 165 26 148]
[117 70 250 129 215 213 74 213 115 91 58 53 251 99 195 214]
[171 201 44 93 68 134 65 51 104 170 64 123 223 19 72 245]
[180 105 167 14 33 127 72 223 98 186 187 53 202 140 190 105]

Motion sensor:
[81 179 77 61 117 200 65 60 124 53 74 21 213 240 57 33]
[232 3 215 137 176 12 68 72 126 7 105 105 88 145 126 196]
[220 120 217 102 78 123 68 201 85 155 161 222 107 186 41 78]
[116 4 201 29 87 49 67 127 124 135 200 68 250 165 26 148]
[117 70 250 129 215 213 74 213 115 91 58 53 251 99 195 214]
[171 201 44 93 68 134 65 51 104 170 64 123 223 19 72 245]
[180 105 167 14 33 127 72 223 98 186 187 53 202 140 190 105]

Door sensor:
[81 179 77 61 117 200 65 60 124 53 74 21 213 240 57 33]
[232 3 215 137 176 12 68 72 126 7 105 105 88 145 126 196]
[220 120 217 102 78 123 68 201 85 155 161 222 107 186 41 78]
[116 4 201 29 87 49 67 127 124 135 200 68 250 165 26 148]
[117 70 250 129 215 213 74 213 115 91 58 53 251 99 195 214]
[171 201 44 93 68 134 65 51 104 170 64 123 223 19 72 245]
[180 105 167 14 33 127 72 223 98 186 187 53 202 140 190 105]
